mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Correspondence calling for Black Student Leadership Conference May 30, 1969 in Harlem

mods:name.mods:namePart: Student Leadership Conference c/o Blackfrica Productions

mods:mods.mods:abstract: Letter to the Williams College Afro-American Society requesting their participation the May 30 1969 Student Leadership Conference in Harlem (New York, New York). The letter is signed by the conferences sponsors: National CORE, Cornell Black Liberation Front, Black Mind, Blackfrica Productions, East Wind, City College (coalition), Columbia (SAS), Queens College (coalition).
mods:mods.mods:accessCondition: Contact Archives and Special Collections at archives@williams.edu
